long_description: WrightSock Stride Quarter socks use an innovative 2-layer design to maximize moisture management and minimize friction for excellent comfort during active sports. Smooth, undyed, hydrophobic Dri-WRIGHT(TM) II inner layer wicks moisture away for cool, dry feet. Dri-WRIGHT II outer layer with mesh weave maximizes moisture control and airflow. Interaction between inner and outer layers absorbs friction and sheering forces to prevent blisters. Mesh panel across the top of the foot allows maximum wicking action; arch braces help support feet. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: WrightSock Stride Quarter socks use an innovative 2-layer design to maximize moisture management and minimize friction for excellent comfort during active sports.
